attributes.action: dismiss Michael Martin, the Speaker of the Commons, from office from incompetence and dereliction of duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Martin has presided over the worst Commons financial scandal ever. He has been instrumental in opposing efforts for greater transparency in allowing the public to have sight of MPs' expenses. He has verbally attacked three MPs in the Chamber on two occasions. He has, in short, demeaned his office of Speaker, and has proved himself unable to fulfill the post with intelligence and dignity.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
